articles.title: Bruins, Marco Sturm must do their ‘homework’ to fix team’s top flaw for stretch run
articles.description:
“We’re going to change [it] a little bit moving forward."

The post Bruins, Marco Sturm must do their ‘homework’ to fix team’s top flaw for stretch run appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bruins' Marco Sturm emphasizes improving the team's penalty kill strategy for upcoming games.
The team plans adjustments ahead of the NHL playoffs starting in April 2026.
Local fans hope these changes will enhance the Bruins' chances for a successful playoff run.

articles.title: This Boston Marathon bombing survivor is running with Miles for Miracles
articles.description:
"Running the Boston Marathon this year as part of the Miles for Miracles Team is my way to heal from my own trauma, and honor and support my son and the many brave little warriors at BCH."

The post This Boston Marathon bombing survivor is running with Miles for Miracles appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston Marathon bombing survivor Juliana Hermenegildo joins Miles for Miracles team.
She aims to support Boston Children's Hospital and honor her son.
Event promotes healing and community support for local trauma survivors.
